translated: At that time, a fire broke out in the house. She came out with the cup still inserted in her vagina.🔽The lay people who were trying to put out the fire saw this and asked, “What is this?”

original: sbom dga' mo la 'di ji zhes dris na khyed kyis ma la dris shig / sring mo la dris shig ces byas pas khyim pa rnams 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo la 'di ji zhes dris na khyed kyis ma la dris shig / sring mo la dris shig ces byas pas khyim pa rnams 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: Pramudita said, “Ask my mother,” or “Ask my sister.”🔽The lay people criticized the nuns.

original: yang dge slong mas rgya skyegs kyi chang chang 'jug na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong mas rgya skyegs kyi chang chang 'jug na ltung ba'o //
translated: The Buddha said, “If a nun inserts a lac wine cup into her vagina, she commits an offense.”

original: yang dge slong mas 'dod chags kyi dbang gis ched du bsams te rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i chang chang 'jug na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong mas 'dod chags kyi dbang gis ched du bsams te rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i chang chang 'jug na ltung ba'o //
translated: Moreover, if a fully ordained nun, out of desire, intentionally drinks alcohol such as beer, she commits an offense.

original: ltung ba dgu bcu lnga pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba dgu bcu lnga pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ninety-fifth downfall is completed.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mos grong gi dbus su khyim mi mo rnams bsdus nas kha phug tu bltas te chos mang du ston cing 'chad pa las /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos grong gi dbus su khyim mi mo rnams bsdus nas kha phug tu bltas te chos mang du ston cing 'chad pa las /
translated: Thulsi, in the middle of a village, gathered together the wives of householders, and while looking at their faces, she taught and explained the Dharma extensively.🔽The wives of the householders were busy with their household duties and chores, so they stood up and left.

original: khyim mi mo rnams khyim gyi bya ba dang byed pas brel te so sor langs te dong ba dang / sbom dga' mo kha phug tu bltas pas ma mthong ste /
analyzed: khyim mi mo rnams khyim gyi bya ba dang byed pas brel te so sor langs te dong ba dang / sbom dga' mo kha phug tu bltas pas ma mthong ste /
translated: Thulsi, looking at their faces, did not see them,

original: da dung yang chos sgrogs pa las /
analyzed: da dung yang chos sgrogs pa las /
translated: and continued to teach the Dharma.🔽When asked, “Friend, to whom are you teaching the Dharma?” she replied, “I am teaching the wives of the householders.”

original: grogs mo khyod su la chos 'chad ces dris na khyim mi mo rnams la 'chad do zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa khyim mi mo rnams ni dong zin to zhes smras nas /
analyzed: grogs mo khyod su la chos 'chad ces dris na khyim mi mo rnams la 'chad do zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa khyim mi mo rnams ni dong zin to zhes smras nas /
translated: “The wives of the householders have left,” they said.

original: de dag gis kyang stan rnams bor te song ba las /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang stan rnams bor te song ba las /
translated: They too threw away their seats and left.

original: stan rnams rkun po dag gis khyer te stor bar gyur nas khyim pa rnams ma dad par gyur pa las bcas /
analyzed: stan rnams rkun po dag gis khyer te stor bar gyur nas khyim pa rnams ma dad par gyur pa las bcas /
translated: The thieves stole the seats and carried them off. The householders lost faith.

original: yang dge slong ma gang chos 'chad na khyim pa'i stan khyim pa la ma gtad par stan bor te song na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang chos 'chad na khyim pa'i stan khyim pa la ma gtad par stan bor te song na ltung ba'o //
translated: “Also, if a bhikṣuṇī teaches the Dharma, if she leaves the seat without giving it to a layperson, it is an offense.”

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: “A bhikṣuṇī” means a bhikṣuṇī like Śrīlā.

original: dge slong mas ci tsam du khyim mi mo rnams la chos 'chad pa'i tshe khyim pa rnams dong bar shes bzhin du /
analyzed: dge slong mas ci tsam du khyim mi mo rnams la chos 'chad pa'i tshe khyim pa rnams dong bar shes bzhin du /
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī teaches the Dharma to the women of a household, and the householders leave,

original: stan bdag nyid kyis ma brtul tam /
analyzed: stan bdag nyid kyis ma brtul tam /
translated: if she does not put away the seat herself,

original: khyim pa la brtul @128b cig ces ma bsgo bar song na 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chang ni nyes byas /
analyzed: khyim pa la brtul @128b cig ces ma bsgo bar song na 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chang ni nyes byas /
translated: or does not tell a layperson to put it away, and leaves, if she goes less than forty-nine fathoms, it is an act of wrong conduct.

original: de las ring du song na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de las ring du song na ltung ba'o //
translated: If she goes more than that, it is an offense.

original: bar chad brgyad byung na nyes med do //
analyzed: bar chad brgyad byung na nyes med do //
translated: If the eight impediments occur, there is no offense.

original: ltung ba dgu bcu drug pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba dgu bcu drug pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ninety-sixth downfall is completed.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mo snga dro bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las khyim bdag gtsang sbra la dga' ba zhig gi sgor phyin te //
analyzed: sbom dga' mo snga dro bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las khyim bdag gtsang sbra la dga' ba zhig gi sgor phyin te //
translated: One morning, Thullanandā went for alms and came to the door of a householder who was very concerned with cleanliness.

original: khyim bdag de'i mal sgo khyams na 'dug pa bu mo zhig bsrung zhing mis reg pa lta ci smos te /
analyzed: khyim bdag de'i mal sgo khyams na 'dug pa bu mo zhig bsrung zhing mis reg pa lta ci smos te /
translated: The householder was sitting in a courtyard near his bed, guarding a girl. He would not allow anyone to touch her,

original: chung ngu na sbrang ma yang 'dug tu mi rung ste skrod pa las sbom dga' mos smras pa /
analyzed: chung ngu na sbrang ma yang 'dug tu mi rung ste skrod pa las sbom dga' mos smras pa /
translated: not even a bee. Thullanandā said,🔽“Girl of good family, give me alms.”

original: mtshan bzangs mo bsod snyoms byin cig ces smras pa dang / bu mos smras pa bdag ni mal 'di srung ngo //
analyzed: mtshan bzangs mo bsod snyoms byin cig ces smras pa dang / bu mos smras pa bdag ni mal 'di srung ngo //
translated: The girl said, “I am guarding this bed.🔽” Thullanandā said, “Bring the alms. I will guard it in the meantime.”

original: sbom dga' mos smras pa bsod snyoms khyer shog / de'i bar du srung ngo zhes nas bu mos bsod snyoms len du song ba'i 'og tu sbom dga' mos rkang pa ma bkrus pa khyim bdag de'i mal thog tu 'dug pa las /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos smras pa bsod snyoms khyer shog / de'i bar du srung ngo zhes nas bu mos bsod snyoms len du song ba'i 'og tu sbom dga' mos rkang pa ma bkrus pa khyim bdag de'i mal thog tu 'dug pa las /
translated: The girl went to get the alms. In the meantime, Thullanandā, without washing her feet, sat on the householder’s bed.

original: khyim bdag de ma dad cing 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: khyim bdag de ma dad cing 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: The householder lost faith in her and criticized her.

original: yang dge slong ma ma bsgo bar khyim pa'i khyim du stan la 'dug na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma ma bsgo bar khyim pa'i khyim du stan la 'dug na ltung ba'o //
translated: Also, if a bhikṣuṇī sits on a seat without permission in a layperson’s house, she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas khyim pa 'dug pa la ma dris par khyim pa'i stan la 'dug na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas khyim pa 'dug pa la ma dris par khyim pa'i stan la 'dug na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī sits on a layperson’s seat without asking permission, she commits an offense.

original: ltung ba dgu bcu bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba dgu bcu bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: The seventy-seventh downfall is completed.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma cig ljongs rgyur dong ba las phye ma red dgongs su khyim bdag po ni med /
analyzed: dge slong ma cig ljongs rgyur dong ba las phye ma red dgongs su khyim bdag po ni med /
translated: A bhikṣuṇī went to the countryside and, in the evening, the householder was not there.

original: khyim bdag mo la dris nas der nyal ba las khyim bdag kyang phyis 'ongs te /
analyzed: khyim bdag mo la dris nas der nyal ba las khyim bdag kyang phyis 'ongs te /
translated: She asked the housewife and slept there. Later, the householder came back.

original: de chung ma dang yongs su spyod pa las /🔽de'i chung ma nyor zhing skad mi snyen par zer ba las dge slong ma de dag gis thos te dge slong ma gzhon nu ma zhig gis gad mo shor nas /
analyzed: de chung ma dang yongs su spyod pa las / de'i chung ma nyor zhing skad mi snyen par zer ba las dge slong ma de dag gis thos te dge slong ma gzhon nu ma zhig gis gad mo shor nas /
translated: He had sex with his wife.🔽The bhikṣuṇī heard the woman crying and not consenting.

original: khyim bdag de la 'phya zhing mi snyan par zer ba las bcas so //
analyzed: khyim bdag de la 'phya zhing mi snyan par zer ba las bcas so //
translated: The bhikṣuṇī laughed, and a young bhikṣuṇī mocked the householder and spoke unpleasantly to him.

original: yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag la ma dris par gnas par byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag la ma dris par gnas par byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: Also, if a bhikṣuṇī stays in a house without asking the householder, she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas ji tsam du khyim bdag po la ma dris par khyim bdag gi khyim du zhag lon par byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas ji tsam du khyim bdag po la ma dris par khyim bdag gi khyim du zhag lon par byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī stays in a householder’s house for more than one night without asking the householder, she commits an offense.

original: bud med dbang che ba yugs sa mo la dris pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bud med dbang che ba yugs sa mo la dris pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if she asks a powerful woman or a widow.

original: ltung ba dgu bcu brgyad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba dgu bcu brgyad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The eighty-ninth downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo ljongs su rgyu zhing dong ba las /
analyzed: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo ljongs su rgyu zhing dong ba las /
translated: The bhikṣuṇī Mahāprajāpatī was traveling through the countryside.

original: khyim bdag gi grong du phyin te /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi grong du phyin te /
translated: She arrived at a householder’s village.

original: de na snga na dge slong @129a * //
analyzed: de na snga na dge slong @129a * //
translated: There were bhikṣuṇīs who had been living there before her.

original: ma 'khod pa gang gis khyim pa'i tha snyad kyis bsu ba dang / phyag byas pa la sogs pa ma byas pas sbom dga' mo khros te /
analyzed: ma 'khod pa gang gis khyim pa'i tha snyad kyis bsu ba dang / phyag byas pa la sogs pa ma byas pas sbom dga' mo khros te /
translated: They did not greet her with the customary courtesies of a householder. Mahāprajāpatī became angry.

original: de dag bskrad nas bdag nyid der gnas pa la bcas /
analyzed: de dag bskrad nas bdag nyid der gnas pa la bcas /
translated: She drove them out and took up residence there herself.

original: yang dge slong ma gang khyim pa'i khyim na sngon gnas pa skrod na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang khyim pa'i khyim na sngon gnas pa skrod na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī drives out bhikṣuṇīs who have been living in a householder’s house before her, she commits an offense.

original: yang dge slong ma gang gis khyim pa'i khyim na dge slong ma snga ma gnas pa las bdag phyis 'ongs te khros nas skrod par byed na ltung ba'o //🔽de la nyes pa med pa ni gnas de nas ma bskrad na srog la sman pa'am /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang gis khyim pa'i khyim na dge slong ma snga ma gnas pa las bdag phyis 'ongs te khros nas skrod par byed na ltung ba'o // de la nyes pa med pa ni gnas de nas ma bskrad na srog la sman pa'am /
translated: “Also, if a bhikṣuṇī, having arrived later at a house of the laity where a bhikṣuṇī was already staying, should angrily drive her out, she would commit an offense.🔽There is no offense if she does not drive her out of that place,

original: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ba tsam gyi tshod na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ba tsam gyi tshod na nyes pa med do //
translated: but only to the extent that it would be a hindrance to her life or to her pure activity.

original: ltung ba dgu bcu dgu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba dgu bcu dgu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ninety-ninth downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos slob ma dang nye gnas dag sngar bsnyen nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos slob ma dang nye gnas dag sngar bsnyen nas /
translated: The bhikṣuṇī Mahāprajāpatī first ordained disciples and students,

original: phyis nad kyis btab par gyur pa la nad g-yog dang sman dang sman dang zas dag ma byin pa las bcas /
analyzed: phyis nad kyis btab par gyur pa la nad g-yog dang sman dang sman dang zas dag ma byin pa las bcas /
translated: but later, when they were afflicted by illness, she did not give them medicine, medical treatment, or food.

original: yang dge slong ma gang lhan cig gnas pa dang ; nye gnas bsnyen pa la nad kyis btab nas grogs mi byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang lhan cig gnas pa dang ; nye gnas bsnyen pa la nad kyis btab nas grogs mi byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: “Also, if a bhikṣuṇī, having ordained a companion or student, does not help her when she is afflicted by illness, she would commit an offense.

original: dge slong mas dge slong ma dang nye gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas la de'i 'og tu na bar gyur la nad g-yog mi byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas dge slong ma dang nye gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas la de'i 'og tu na bar gyur la nad g-yog mi byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a fully ordained nun does not nurse a fully ordained nun or a female novice who is her attendant when she becomes ill, she commits an offense.

original: sman mi byed na yang ltung ba'o //
analyzed: sman mi byed na yang ltung ba'o //
translated: If she does not give her medicine, she commits an offense.

original: kha zas la sogs pas gso bar mi byed na yang ltung ba'o //🔽bdag la med na gzhan las btsal te sbyin no //
analyzed: kha zas la sogs pas gso bar mi byed na yang ltung ba'o // bdag la med na gzhan las btsal te sbyin no //
translated: If she does not nurse her by giving her food and so forth, she commits an offense.🔽If she does not have it, she should search for it elsewhere and give it to her.

original: bdag mi khom na gzhan la yang bcol te nad g-yog byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: bdag mi khom na gzhan la yang bcol te nad g-yog byed du gzhug go //
translated: If she is not free, she should ask someone else to nurse her.

original: yo byad ma rnyed pa 'am /
analyzed: yo byad ma rnyed pa 'am /
translated: If she does not find the necessary articles,

original: med pa 'am bar chad brgyad byung na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: med pa 'am bar chad brgyad byung na nyes pa med do //
translated: or if she does not have them, or if she is prevented by one of the eight obstacles, there is no offense.

original: ltung ba brgya pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya pa rdzogs so /
translated: The hundred offenses are completed.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mos bsams pa /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos bsams pa /
translated: Thulsi thought,

original: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ni spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas de dang lhan cig gnas par yang bdag gis mi nus /
analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ni spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas de dang lhan cig gnas par yang bdag gis mi nus /
translated: “The great leader of women is endowed with perfect abandonment. I cannot live with her.

original: chos sbyin ma ni 'khor mang bas de dang gnas par yang bdag gis mi nus te /
analyzed: chos sbyin ma ni 'khor mang bas de dang gnas par yang bdag gis mi nus te /
translated: The gift of Dharma is not something I can do with a large retinue.

original: goo ta ma rid de ma dang lhan cig tu gnas so snyam nas /
analyzed: goo ta ma rid de ma dang lhan cig tu gnas so snyam nas /
translated: Gautami is emaciated. She lives with her mother.

original: de dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur pa las /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur pa las /
translated: So he lived with her.

original: srod kyi rus su sbom dga' mo zas bzang po'i gtam dang / zas zhim po'i gtam mang du byed cing de 'ba' zhig gis nam nangs par byed de /
analyzed: srod kyi rus su sbom dga' mo zas bzang po'i gtam dang / zas zhim po'i gtam mang du byed cing de 'ba' zhig gis nam nangs par byed de /
translated: In the evening, when it was time to sleep, Bhadraka would talk a lot about good food and delicious meals, and he would keep her awake with only that.

original: slob ma dag la chos mi slob bo //
analyzed: slob ma dag la chos mi slob bo //
translated: He did not teach the Dharma to his disciples.

original: de nas snga dro'i @129b dus su bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i @129b dus su bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do //
translated: Then, in the morning, he would go out for alms.

original: sbom dga' me rtag par yang de ltar byed pa las goo ta ma rid de mas de'i 'khor rnams mi dge ba las bzlog ste dge ba la btsud pa las sbom dga' mo khros 'khrugs rngams nas goo ta ma rid de ma 'di sngon bu sha za ba
analyzed: sbom dga' me rtag par yang de ltar byed pa las goo ta ma rid de mas de'i 'khor rnams mi dge ba las bzlog ste dge ba la btsud pa las sbom dga' mo khros 'khrugs rngams nas goo ta ma rid de ma 'di sngon bu sha za ba
translated: Bhadraka always acted like this. Gautami's mother turned her retinue away from non-virtue and led them to virtue. Bhadraka became angry, upset, and agitated. He said, Gautami's mother is a cannibal who previously ate her own son's flesh.

original: yin no zhes 'dzer cing bskrad pa las bcas /
analyzed: yin no zhes 'dzer cing bskrad pa las bcas /
translated: He reviled her and drove her away.

original: yang dge slong ma gang dbyar mo khang nas dge slong ma skrod na ltung ba'o //🔽dge slong mas ji tsam du khros 'khrugs rngams te /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang dbyar mo khang nas dge slong ma skrod na ltung ba'o // dge slong mas ji tsam du khros 'khrugs rngams te /
translated: Also, if a fully ordained nun throws out a fully ordained nun from the rainy season retreat house, she commits an offense.🔽A fully ordained nun may, in anger, throw out a fully ordained nun from the temple or have her thrown out, or she may create obstacles for her.

original: dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang nas dge slong ma skrod dam skrod du 'jug gam bar chad brgyad byung na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang nas dge slong ma skrod dam skrod du 'jug gam bar chad brgyad byung na nyes pa med do //
translated: If she does any of these things, she commits an offense.

original: ltung ba brgya rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and first downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma rid de dang aa ri sta gnyis khri gcig gi steng mthang sprad cing nyal ba las /
analyzed: dge slong ma rid de dang aa ri sta gnyis khri gcig gi steng mthang sprad cing nyal ba las /
translated: Two fully ordained nuns, a thin one and a fat one, were lying down together, their bodies touching, on the same bed.

original: don nyung ngu ba'i dge slong ma dag 'phya ba las bcas /🔽yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng du nyal na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: don nyung ngu ba'i dge slong ma dag 'phya ba las bcas / yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng du nyal na ltung ba'o //
translated: The nuns who had few desires complained and criticized her,🔽“How can a fully ordained nun lie down on the same bed as another fully ordained nun?”

original: yang dge slong mas ched du bsams te khri gcig gi steng du gos gcig gi nang du mthang sprad de nyal na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong mas ched du bsams te khri gcig gi steng du gos gcig gi nang du mthang sprad de nyal na ltung ba'o //
translated: “If a fully ordained nun intentionally lies down on the same bed as another fully ordained nun, their bodies touching, under the same sheet, even if it is just for a moment, she commits an offense entailing confession.”

original: rjes su gnang ba ni dge slong ma dag cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las /
analyzed: rjes su gnang ba ni dge slong ma dag cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las /
translated: The permission is this: Some nuns went wandering in the countryside.

original: khyim bdag gi grong du gnas par gyur pa las /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi grong du gnas par gyur pa las /
translated: They stayed in a householder's village.

translated: In order to make you my ally in battle, if you were to go forth, why would you sit in silence as if you were entering the meditative absorption of the fourth concentration?🔽 She said, I also know the deceptions and faults of those laywomen,🔽but I do not know the deceptions and faults of these nuns.

original: dge slong ma 'di dag gi g-yo mtshang ni ngas kyang mi shes so zhes smras pa dang sbom dga' mos smras pa skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ni lci ba brgyad khas blangs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin /
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di dag gi g-yo mtshang ni ngas kyang mi shes so zhes smras pa dang sbom dga' mos smras pa skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ni lci ba brgyad khas blangs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin /
translated: Pramudita said, The great leader of the people was fully ordained after accepting eight heavy precepts.

original: autpa la'i kha dog ma ni grong khyer chen po drug tu smad 'tshong ma byed pa yin /
analyzed: autpa la'i kha dog ma ni grong khyer chen po drug tu smad 'tshong ma byed pa yin /
translated: The one with the color of a blue lotus was a prostitute in the six great cities.

original: goo ta ma ring de ma ni sngon bu sha zos pa yin no zhes dge slong ma dag gi g-yo mtshang bstan pa dang / phyis dge slong ma dag 'thab mo byung ba'i tshe de dag gi g-yo mtshang smra zhing de skad zer ba las bcas /🔽yang dge slong ma gang bud med gtum mo rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: goo ta ma ring de ma ni sngon bu sha zos pa yin no zhes dge slong ma dag gi g-yo mtshang bstan pa dang / phyis dge slong ma dag 'thab mo byung ba'i tshe de dag gi g-yo mtshang smra zhing de skad zer ba las bcas / yang dge slong ma gang bud med gtum mo rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: Later, when the nuns quarreled, they would say such things to each other.🔽If a nun gives full ordination to a violent woman, she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas bud med gtum mo 'thab mo rgod par shes bzhin du rab tu phyung na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas bud med gtum mo 'thab mo rgod par shes bzhin du rab tu phyung na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a nun gives full ordination to a violent woman who is known to be quarrelsome and argumentative, she commits an offense.

original: de ltar mi shes na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar mi shes na nyes pa med do //
translated: If she does not know, there is no offense.

original: ltung ba brgya rtsa bcu dgu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya rtsa bcu dgu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and nineteenth downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Shravasti.

original: sbom dga' mo snga dro bsod snyoms la song ba las bud med dang khyim thab dang bu dag shi ba'i mya ngan gyis gzir zhing du ba rab tu phyung ba las /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo snga dro bsod snyoms la song ba las bud med dang khyim thab dang bu dag shi ba'i mya ngan gyis gzir zhing du ba rab tu phyung ba las /
translated: Pramudita went for alms in the morning and saw a woman, her husband, and their son who were suffering from the grief of death and had gone forth.

original: da rab tu phyung yang rtag tu ngu zhing mya ngan byed par gyur te /
analyzed: da rab tu phyung yang rtag tu ngu zhing mya ngan byed par gyur te /
translated: Now, even though she has gone forth, she is always crying and grieving.

original: chung ngu na rmi lam du yang ston cig ces zer ro //
analyzed: chung ngu na rmi lam du yang ston cig ces zer ro //
translated: Please teach her even in a dream.”

original: de ltar gyur pa don nyung ngu mas 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa don nyung ngu mas 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: Some people with little understanding criticized this.

original: yang dge slong ma gang mya ngan gyis gzir ba'i @133b bud med rab tu byung na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang mya ngan gyis gzir ba'i @133b bud med rab tu byung na ltung ba'o //
translated: “A nun who gives the going forth to a woman who is tormented by grief commits an offense.”

original: dge slong mas bud med mya ngan gyis mnan ba mya ngan ma sangs bar shes bzhin du rab tu byung na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas bud med mya ngan gyis mnan ba mya ngan ma sangs bar shes bzhin du rab tu byung na ltung ba'o //
translated: “A nun who knows that a woman is overwhelmed by grief but gives her the going forth before her grief has subsided commits an offense.”

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred twenty-first training rule is finished.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was staying at Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mos bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa la lo gnyis kyis bar du khrims ma phog kyang lo gnyis ma bsrungs par thal byung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa las bcas /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa la lo gnyis kyis bar du khrims ma phog kyang lo gnyis ma bsrungs par thal byung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa las bcas /
translated: Thrilled with joy, she gave the full ordination to a woman who had not been instructed for two years, and who had not been guarded for two years.

original: yang dge slong ma gang lo gnyis su chos drug dang mthun pa'i chos drug la ma bslabs par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung pa'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang lo gnyis su chos drug dang mthun pa'i chos drug la ma bslabs par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung pa'o //
translated: Also, if a fully ordained nun gives full ordination to a postulant nun who has not trained for two years in the six topics and the six complementary rules, she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas chos drug dang mthun pa'i chos drug la ma bslabs par shes bzhin du thal byung bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas chos drug dang mthun pa'i chos drug la ma bslabs par shes bzhin du thal byung bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a fully ordained nun knowingly gives full ordination to a postulant nun who has not trained in the six topics and the six complementary rules, she commits an offense.

original: de la chos drug ces pa ni gcig pu lam du mi 'gro ba dang / gcig pu chu mi rgal ba dang / skyes pa la reg par mi bya ba dang / skyes pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du zhag lon par mi bya ba dang /
analyzed: de la chos drug ces pa ni gcig pu lam du mi 'gro ba dang / gcig pu chu mi rgal ba dang / skyes pa la reg par mi bya ba dang / skyes pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du zhag lon par mi bya ba dang /
translated: The six topics are: not to travel alone on the road, not to cross a body of water alone, not to touch a man, not to stay overnight in the same room as a man,

original: smyan mi bya ba dang ; grogs kyi kha na ma tho ba phas pham pa'am lhag ma byung ba mthong na mi bcab bo //
analyzed: smyan mi bya ba dang ; grogs kyi kha na ma tho ba phas pham pa'am lhag ma byung ba mthong na mi bcab bo //
translated: not to act as a matchmaker, and not to conceal a companion’s root or partial defeat.

original: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug ni gser dngul la reg par mi bya ba dang / gsang ba'i spu mi breg pa dang / sa mi brko ba dang / rtsva sngon mo mi gcad pa dang / byin len bya ba dang / spangs pa'i kha zas mi bza' ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug ni gser dngul la reg par mi bya ba dang / gsang ba'i spu mi breg pa dang / sa mi brko ba dang / rtsva sngon mo mi gcad pa dang / byin len bya ba dang / spangs pa'i kha zas mi bza' ba'o //
translated: The six corresponding rules are: not to touch gold and silver, not to cut hair in private, not to dig the earth, not to cut green plants, to do the formal accepting of raw grain, and not to eat discarded food.

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and twenty-first downfall is concluded.

original: // / mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: // / mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: The summary:🔽Training in the six rules, not dismissed by her husband,🔽If she is given clothing, later she is displeased,

original: chos drug rnams la bslab pa dang / khyim thab kyis kyang ma btang dang // gal te bdag la gos byin dang // phyi nas khyod ni mi dga' dang // lo re bzhin du ma gnang dang ; / zhag gis chod pa'i dad pa dang //
analyzed: chos drug rnams la bslab pa dang / khyim thab kyis kyang ma btang dang // gal te bdag la gos byin dang // phyi nas khyod ni mi dga' dang // lo re bzhin du ma gnang dang ; / zhag gis chod pa'i dad pa dang //
translated: Not permitted every year, faith interrupted by days,

original: zla ba phyed cing gdams pa dang // dge slong med pa'i gso sbyin no //
analyzed: zla ba phyed cing gdams pa dang // dge slong med pa'i gso sbyin no //
translated: Instruction every half-month, confession without a monk.

original: ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was at Śrāvastī.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge tshul ma rnams chos drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug lo gnyis bslabs nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal na /
analyzed: dge tshul ma rnams chos drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug lo gnyis bslabs nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal na /
translated: The Buddha said, The nuns should train for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed, and then they should be fully ordained.

original: sbom dga' mo'i slob ma rnams la gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug bslabs kyang da dung bsnyen par rdzogs par byed du mi btub pas don nyung du bas 'phya ba las bcas /🔽yang dge slong ma gang lo gnyis su chos @134a * //🔽drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug bslab par shes la bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbom dga' mo'i slob ma rnams la gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug bslabs kyang da dung bsnyen par rdzogs par byed du mi btub pas don nyung du bas 'phya ba las bcas / yang dge slong ma gang lo gnyis su chos @134a * // drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug bslab par shes la bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The disciples of Bhadra were not able to be fully ordained even after they had trained for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed. Therefore, the Buddha decreed, The training should be shortened.🔽If a fully ordained nun knows that a woman has trained for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed, but does not ordain her, she commits an offense.🔽If a fully ordained nun knows that a woman has trained for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed, but does not ordain her, she commits an offense.

translated: If a fully ordained nun knows that a woman has trained for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed, but does not ordain her, she commits an offense.🔽If a fully ordained nun knows that a woman has trained for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed, but does not ordain her, she commits an offense.🔽If a fully ordained nun knows that a woman has trained for two years in the six rules and the six rules that are to be followed, but does not ordain her, she commits an offense.

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and twenty-second downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mo snga dro bsod snyoms la song ba las /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo snga dro bsod snyoms la song ba las /
translated: Pramudita went for alms in the morning.

original: khyo shug gnyis shig 'thab pa mthong nas /
analyzed: khyo shug gnyis shig 'thab pa mthong nas /
translated: She saw a married couple fighting.

original: sbom dga' mos de'i chung ma la khyod rab tu byung shig ces bsgo nas de'i khyo ma dad bzhin du rab tu byung ba las bcas /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos de'i chung ma la khyod rab tu byung shig ces bsgo nas de'i khyo ma dad bzhin du rab tu byung ba las bcas /
translated: Pramudita told the wife, “You should go forth.” Her husband, though not faithful, allowed her to go forth.

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang khyim thab kyis ma btang bar shes bzhin du bud med rab tu 'byin na ltung ba'o //
translated: “If any bhikṣuṇī knowingly gives the going forth to a woman whose husband has not given permission, it is a downfall.”

original: dge slong mas gzhan gyi bud med khyim thab kyis ma btang bar shes bzhin du rab tu 'byin na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas gzhan gyi bud med khyim thab kyis ma btang bar shes bzhin du rab tu 'byin na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī gives the going forth to a woman whose husband has not given permission, it is a downfall.

original: khyim thab ring por song ste thal byung ma 'khor ba 'am bud med rang dbang yod na nyes med do //
analyzed: khyim thab ring por song ste thal byung ma 'khor ba 'am bud med rang dbang yod na nyes med do //
translated: If the husband has gone far away, has died, or if the woman is independent, there is no offense.

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and twenty-third downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom ma dga' mo la slob ma dag gis bdag cag bsnyen par rdzogs par bya bar gsol zhes byas ba dang / sbom dga' mos smras pa dang / nga la chos gos byin cig dang gdod bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes nas de dag chos gos byin nas de'i 'og tu gdod bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang don nyung ngu pas 'phya ba las bcas /🔽yang dge slong ma gang bsnyen par rdzogs 'dod pa la gal te nga la chos gos byin na de'i 'og tu khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes de skad zer na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: sbom ma dga' mo la slob ma dag gis bdag cag bsnyen par rdzogs par bya bar gsol zhes byas ba dang / sbom dga' mos smras pa dang / nga la chos gos byin cig dang gdod bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes nas de dag chos gos byin nas de'i 'og tu gdod bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang don nyung ngu pas 'phya ba las bcas / yang dge slong ma gang bsnyen par rdzogs 'dod pa la gal te nga la chos gos byin na de'i 'og tu khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes de skad zer na ltung ba'o //
translated: When the nuns who were the disciples of Thullanandā asked her to give them full ordination, she said, “Give me a robe and I will give you full ordination.” They gave her a robe and then she gave them full ordination.🔽The Buddha laid down a rule: “If a nun who wants to give full ordination says to a candidate, ‘If you give me a robe, I will give you full ordination,’ she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas slob ma bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa la rngan pa chos gos dag len na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas slob ma bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa la rngan pa chos gos dag len na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “If a nun who wants to give full ordination to a pupil takes a robe as a gift, she commits an offense.

original: slob ma chos gos mang la ser sna can zhig na ser sna dang dbral pa'i phyir thabs des bslangs na nyes med do //
analyzed: slob ma chos gos mang la ser sna can zhig na ser sna dang dbral pa'i phyir thabs des bslangs na nyes med do //
translated: “If the pupil has many robes, but is stingy, and the nun takes a robe from her in order to remove her stinginess, there is no offense.”

original: ltung ba brgya nyid shu bzhi ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyid shu bzhi ba rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and fourth downfall.

original: // / sten pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / sten pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: goo ta ma ring de khyim pa mo dag la chos bshad pa'i rjes la khyod khyim gyi bya ba rnams thong shig dang phyis rab tu byung ngo zhes @134b smras nas /
analyzed: goo ta ma ring de khyim pa mo dag la chos bshad pa'i rjes la khyod khyim gyi bya ba rnams thong shig dang phyis rab tu byung ngo zhes @134b smras nas /
translated: After the householder Gautama had taught the Dharma to the women, he said, “You should give up your household duties. Later you can go forth.”

original: de dag gis khyim gyi bya ba rnams btang ste /
analyzed: de dag gis khyim gyi bya ba rnams btang ste /
translated: They gave up their household duties.

original: bdag cag rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes byas pa dang / des rab tu ma phyung ngo //
analyzed: bdag cag rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes byas pa dang / des rab tu ma phyung ngo //
translated: They said, “Please let us go forth.” But he did not let them go forth.

original: des rab tu ma phyung ba dang khyim mi mo rnams 'phya bar gyur te /
analyzed: des rab tu ma phyung ba dang khyim mi mo rnams 'phya bar gyur te /
translated: The women of the household criticized him,

original: bdag cag gis khyim gyis bya ba rnams kyang btang ba las rab tu ma phyung ngo zhes 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: bdag cag gis khyim gyis bya ba rnams kyang btang ba las rab tu ma phyung ngo zhes 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: “We gave up our household duties, but he won’t let us go forth.”

original: yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag mo khyim so thong shig dang phyis khyod rab tu dbyung ba mi dka'o zhes de skad smras la /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag mo khyim so thong shig dang phyis khyod rab tu dbyung ba mi dka'o zhes de skad smras la /
translated: “If a nun says to a householder, ‘Give up your household duties. Later it won’t be difficult for you to go forth,’

original: de'i 'og tu rab tu mi 'byin na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rab tu mi 'byin na ltung ba'o //
translated: but then does not let her go forth, she commits an offense.”

original: dge slong mas khyim mi lo la khyim so thong shig dang phyis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes smras pa las de'i 'og tu ma phyung na thams cad du 'ong ltung ba 'gyur ro//
analyzed: dge slong mas khyim mi lo la khyim so thong shig dang phyis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes smras pa las de'i 'og tu ma phyung na thams cad du 'ong ltung ba 'gyur ro//
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī says to a householder, “Leave your home for one year and later I will give you ordination,” and then does not give her ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.

original: bar chad brgyad la sogs pa'i glo bur ba byung ba la nyes med do //
analyzed: bar chad brgyad la sogs pa'i glo bur ba byung ba la nyes med do //
translated: There is no offense if there are obstacles such as the eight unfavorable times.

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred twenty-fifth downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo bud med mang pos rab tu 'byin par gsol ba la de dag cig car rab tu 'byin par mi byed cing kun kyang lo re re zhing re re bsngos la /
analyzed: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo bud med mang pos rab tu 'byin par gsol ba la de dag cig car rab tu 'byin par mi byed cing kun kyang lo re re zhing re re bsngos la /
translated: The bhikṣuṇī Upacālā was asked by many women to give them ordination. She did not give them ordination all at once, but assigned each of them to a year.

original: ming yang lo gcig ma lo gnyis ma zhes btags shing 'bod pa dang / dge slong ma gzhan dag gis khyod ci'i phyir de skad 'bod ces dris na /
analyzed: ming yang lo gcig ma lo gnyis ma zhes btags shing 'bod pa dang / dge slong ma gzhan dag gis khyod ci'i phyir de skad 'bod ces dris na /
translated: She called them “one-year” and “two-year” women. Other bhikṣuṇīs asked, “Why do you call them that?”

original: de dag gi ming ni lobs dka' ste de skad du 'bod na bde'o zhes de skad du smras pa las don nyung ngu mas 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: de dag gi ming ni lobs dka' ste de skad du 'bod na bde'o zhes de skad du smras pa las don nyung ngu mas 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: It is difficult to learn their names, so it is good to call them by their names.

original: yang dge slong ma gang lo re zhing rab tu 'byin na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang lo re zhing rab tu 'byin na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī gives full ordination every year, she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas bud med rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba las cig car du rab tu mi 'byin zhing lo re zhing re re 'byin par byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas bud med rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba las cig car du rab tu mi 'byin zhing lo re zhing re re 'byin par byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī does not give full ordination immediately to a woman who requests it, but gives it every year, she commits an offense.

original: gnyis ka ming mthun pa las lo gcig ma zhes 'bod pa dang lo re bzhin du gsol du 'ongs pa'i thad kar rab tu 'byin pa la nyes med do //
analyzed: gnyis ka ming mthun pa las lo gcig ma zhes 'bod pa dang lo re bzhin du gsol du 'ongs pa'i thad kar rab tu 'byin pa la nyes med do //
translated: If both have the same name, and if she gives full ordination to the one who comes every year, there is no offense.

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu drug pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu drug pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred twenty-sixth offense is finished.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs /
translated: The Teacher was staying at Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mo zla ba phyed kyi tshe dge slong pha la lung ston par gsol ba'i dad ba blangs nas dge slong ma'i gso sbyin gyi dus su dad pa mi len pa dang / dge slong ma gzhan gyis ci'i phyir dad pa mi len ces dris pa dang /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo zla ba phyed kyi tshe dge slong pha la lung ston par gsol ba'i dad ba blangs nas dge slong ma'i gso sbyin gyi dus su dad pa mi len pa dang / dge slong ma gzhan gyis ci'i phyir dad pa mi len ces dris pa dang /
translated: Other nuns asked, “Why don’t you accept the faith offering?”

analyzed: dad pas chog go zhes zer na ltung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu bdun pa rdzogs so /

analyzed: // / na ma bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la phyed phyed cing cing dge 'dun pa la chos bstan pa lung nos shig ces gsungs pa las /

analyzed: rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas par 'chad pa'o //

original: ltung ba brgya nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs so /

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste //

analyzed: don nyung ngus pas 'phya ba las bcas /

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong med par gso sbyin byed na ltung ba'o //

analyzed: dge slong mas ched du bsams te dge slong med pa'i gnas su gso sbyin byas na ltung bar 'gyur ro ;

analyzed: / lam ring por 'gro ba'i tshe gso sbyin gyi dus la bab na dge slong med na 'ang nyes med do //

analyzed: gang na dge slong gi dge 'dun yod pa la sems kyis dmigs shing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

analyzed: ltung ba brgya nyi shud gu pa rdzogs so /

analyzed: // / mdor bstan pa ni //
translated: The brief presentation:

analyzed: dge slong med par dbyar mi ngas //

analyzed: spangs nas bza' bar mi bya dang // rgyud kyang gzhag par mi bya'o //

analyzed: ston pa mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma dag cig dge slong med pa'i gtsug lag khang du tshul du zhugs pa las bcas /

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong med pa'i gtsug lag khang du dbyar gnas shing tshul du 'jug na ltung ba'o //

analyzed: tshul du 'jug pa'i thad kar dge slong thams cad babs sam shi bar gyur na nyes med do //

original: ltung ba brgya sum cu ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu ba rdzogs so /
translated: The thirty-first rule is finished.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang dbyar gnas nas dge 'dun gnyi ga las gnas gsum po dag gi skabs mi 'byed na ltung ba'o //

analyzed: gong ma dang gnyi ga la 'ang lci ba'i chos su gtogs so //

original: ltung ba brgya sum cu gcig pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu gcig pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and thirty-first downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

analyzed: sbom dga' mo dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la tshig mi snyan pa sna tshogs kyis bsdigs par byed pa dang / don nyung ngu bas 'phyas pa las bcas /

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang tshogs la ngan du zer na ltung ba'o //
translated: “If any bhikṣuṇī speaks unpleasantly to the community, she commits a downfall.”

original: ltung ba brgya sum cu gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu gnyis pa rdzogs so /

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang tshogs la mi snyan par zer na ltung ba'o //

analyzed: sogs te / mya ngan gyi tshig tu 'gyur ro cog gang smras kyang ltung ba'o //

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

analyzed: chos sbyin ma ni 'phrin gyis rab tu byung ba yin / goo ta ma rid de ma ni bu sha zos pa yin no zhes bsngags pa las ser sna byed cing mi snyan par bsgrags pa las /
translated: Dharmadana went forth by messenger.🔽Gautami Kanta ate her son’s flesh.” She was stingy and proclaimed their faults.

original: khyim pa dag gis 'phya ba las bcas ;

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang bsngags pa la ser sna byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: Also, if a bhikṣuṇī is stingy with praise, she commits an offense.

analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu lnga pa rdzogs so /
translated: The fifty-third offense entailing expulsion is finished.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos gnas khang mang du brtsigs te /
analyzed: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos gnas khang mang du brtsigs te /

analyzed: dge slong ma gsar du 'ongs pa gnas khang med pa dag la 'ang brnyan por mi ster ba las don nyung du mas 'phya ba las bcas /

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mos gzhan gyis sngar bsod snyoms bslangs kyis dogs pa'i phyir nang par snga rab tu bsod snyoms la 'ongs pa las /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos gzhan gyis sngar bsod snyoms bslangs kyis dogs pa'i phyir nang par snga rab tu bsod snyoms la 'ongs pa las /
translated: Because of the fear that others would request alms before her, Thullanandā went for alms in the morning very early.

original: bram ze dag bkra shis byas pa'i sgor phyin pa dang dge sbyong ma mgo reg ma 'di dag mthong bas ltas ngan to zhes shin tu brdegs te /
analyzed: bram ze dag bkra shis byas pa'i sgor phyin pa dang dge sbyong ma mgo reg ma 'di dag mthong bas ltas ngan to zhes shin tu brdegs te /
translated: When she arrived at the door where a brahmin was performing an auspicious rite, he said, “It is an inauspicious sign to see these shaven-headed, degenerate, shaven-headed bhikṣuṇīs.” He beat her severely.

original: mig dag kyang skrangs nas slar gnas su phyin pa dang dge slong ma dag gis ci'i phyir mig skrangs zhes dris pa dang des kyang zhib tu smras so ;
analyzed: mig dag kyang skrangs nas slar gnas su phyin pa dang dge slong ma dag gis ci'i phyir mig skrangs zhes dris pa dang des kyang zhib tu smras so ;
translated: Her eyes became swollen shut, and when she returned to the nunnery, the bhikṣuṇīs asked her, “Why are your eyes swollen?” She told them in detail.

original: / de lta bur gyur pa don nyung du pas 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: / de lta bur gyur pa don nyung du pas 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: Because of that, the one with few duties criticized her.

original: yang dge slong ma gang rnyed pa la ser sna byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang rnyed pa la ser sna byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: Also, if a bhikṣuṇī is stingy with regard to gain, she commits an offense.

original: rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: “Gain” is of two kinds:

original: zas kyi rnyed pa dang / gos kyi rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: zas kyi rnyed pa dang / gos kyi rnyed pa'o //
translated: gain of food and gain of clothing.

original: skabs 'dir zas kyi rnyed pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: skabs 'dir zas kyi rnyed pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: In this context, it is connected with gain of food.

original: dge slong mas zas kyi rnyed pa la phrag dog bya ba'i phyir dge slong ma gzhan dag bsod snyoms la 'dong ba la ngas ma bslangs kyi bar du khyed ma slong shig ces bsgo na 'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas zas kyi rnyed pa la phrag dog bya ba'i phyir dge slong ma gzhan dag bsod snyoms la 'dong ba la ngas ma bslangs kyi bar du khyed ma slong shig ces bsgo na 'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī tells other bhikṣuṇīs, “Do not go for alms; I will give you food,” in order to be jealous of the gain of food, she commits an offense.

original: gzhan pas sngar song ste bdag nyid kyis bslangs te zas grub na 'ang ltung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan pas sngar song ste bdag nyid kyis bslangs te zas grub na 'ang ltung ba'o //
translated: If she goes before the others and asks for herself and obtains food, she commits an offense.

original: ltung ba brgya sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: The thirty-seventh chapter on offenses is finished.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mos slob ma dang nye gnas dag la chos mi slob cing rgun 'brum dang bal po se'u dag mnyed cing las ngan pa mang du byed du bcug pa las slob ma dag gis chos bshad par gsol ba dang / sbom dga' mos smras pa ngas 'phags pa drug sde pa rnams @137a * //
analyzed: sbom dga' mos slob ma dang nye gnas dag la chos mi slob cing rgun 'brum dang bal po se'u dag mnyed cing las ngan pa mang du byed du bcug pa las slob ma dag gis chos bshad par gsol ba dang / sbom dga' mos smras pa ngas 'phags pa drug sde pa rnams @137a * //
translated: Thullanandā did not teach the Dharma to her students and attendants, but made them do many bad things, such as pressing grapes and pomegranates.🔽When her students requested her to teach the Dharma, Thullanandā said, “I pressed grapes and pomegranates for the sake of the Dharma for the noble group of six.

original: la chos kyi phyir ba la po se'u dang rgun 'bru dag mnyed mnyed de ni lag pa chu bur gyis gang /
analyzed: la chos kyi phyir ba la po se'u dang rgun 'bru dag mnyed mnyed de ni lag pa chu bur gyis gang /
translated: My hands are swollen from the blisters.

original: phyag 'tshal 'tshal nas klad pa'i skra byi zhing pus mo 'ang rdol /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal 'tshal nas klad pa'i skra byi zhing pus mo 'ang rdol /
translated: I bowed down to them, and my head is swollen from the blisters.

original: the tshom 'dri 'dri ste kha chu bur gyis gang ste /
analyzed: the tshom 'dri 'dri ste kha chu bur gyis gang ste /
translated: I asked them questions, and my mouth is swollen from the blisters.

original: de lta bu dka' ba mang po spyad pas chos thos pa de dang khyed kyis las mang po ma byas par ci'i phyir chos bstan zhes zer ba las bcas /
analyzed: de lta bu dka' ba mang po spyad pas chos thos pa de dang khyed kyis las mang po ma byas par ci'i phyir chos bstan zhes zer ba las bcas /
translated: I underwent many hardships to hear the Dharma. Why do you not teach the Dharma without undergoing many hardships?”

original: yang dge slong ma gang chos la ser sna byed na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang chos la ser sna byed na ltung ba'o //
translated: It is a downfall to be stingy with the Dharma.

original: dge slong mas slob ma dang nye gnas dag chos 'dri'am gzhan dag chos 'dri yang rung ste phrag dog dang ser sna'i bsam pas mi ston na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas slob ma dang nye gnas dag chos 'dri'am gzhan dag chos 'dri yang rung ste phrag dog dang ser sna'i bsam pas mi ston na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a fully ordained nun, out of jealousy and stinginess, does not teach the Dharma to a student or attendant, or to someone else who requests it, she commits an offense.

original: bdag la klan ka tshol lam shes sam mi shes bgam pa'i phyir 'dri ba la ma bstan na 'ang nyes med do //
analyzed: bdag la klan ka tshol lam shes sam mi shes bgam pa'i phyir 'dri ba la ma bstan na 'ang nyes med do //
translated: If she does not teach the Dharma to someone who asks about it in order to find fault with her, or to someone who asks out of curiosity, or to someone who asks in order to debate with her, she commits no offense.

original: ltung ba brgya sum cu brgyad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu brgyad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The thirty-eighth chapter on downfalls is completed.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kha zas byin len byas nas mdun du bzhag ste za ba'i tshe /
analyzed: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kha zas byin len byas nas mdun du bzhag ste za ba'i tshe /
translated: The group of twelve fully ordained nuns received food and then put it aside and ate it later.

original: za bzhin du langs shing las byed /
analyzed: za bzhin du langs shing las byed /
translated: While eating, they stood up and did work.🔽Then they sat down again and ate.

original: de nas yang slar 'dug cing za ba las don nyung du mas 'phya ba las bcas /
analyzed: de nas yang slar 'dug cing za ba las don nyung du mas 'phya ba las bcas /
translated: The Buddha laid down a rule against this.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zas zos te spangs nas zos na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zas zos te spangs nas zos na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a fully ordained nun eats food after having refused it, she commits an offense.

original: lhag mar ma byas pa'i zas zos na 'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad pa dang khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: lhag mar ma byas pa'i zas zos na 'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad pa dang khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between this and the above explanation that if one eats food that has not been left over, one commits a downfall?

original: gong ma ni spyod lam las kyang nyams sems kyi rgyud kyis kyang mi bza' bar bcad nas kha zas zhig rnyed de za bar 'dod na lhag mar gyis te zo shig ces gsungs /
analyzed: gong ma ni spyod lam las kyang nyams sems kyi rgyud kyis kyang mi bza' bar bcad nas kha zas zhig rnyed de za bar 'dod na lhag mar gyis te zo shig ces gsungs /
translated: The above refers to a situation where, having decided not to eat a certain food, one later wishes to eat it and must do so after having it left over.

original: 'dir ni kha zas za ba'i tshe sems kyi rgyud kyis ma bcad par 'phral du spyod lam las nyams par byed cing /
analyzed: 'dir ni kha zas za ba'i tshe sems kyi rgyud kyis ma bcad par 'phral du spyod lam las nyams par byed cing /
translated: This rule refers to a situation where, while eating food, one does not decide mentally not to eat it, but one nevertheless spoils one’s demeanor.

original: yang za yang 'dug par byed pa las ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang za yang 'dug par byed pa las ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One commits a downfall by eating and sitting down again.

original: ltung ba brgya sum cu dgu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya sum cu dgu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The thirty-ninth downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro'i dus su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang khyim bdag mo zhig gi sgor bsod snyoms bslangs pa las /
analyzed: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro'i dus su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang khyim bdag mo zhig gi sgor bsod snyoms bslangs pa las /
translated: In the morning, the nun Thīlapuṭa went for alms. She went to the door of a householder’s wife and asked for alms.

original: khyim bdag mo de du ba mthong nas sbom dga' mos ci'i phyir du zhes dris pa dang / des bdag gi bu thon bu byung bas bu'i bya ba dag ma 'tshal te khyod kyis mkhyen nam zhes dris pa dang / sbom dga' mos smras pa khyod ni khab khrin dang 'dra ste las gcig pu byed shes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: khyim bdag mo de du ba mthong nas sbom dga' mos ci'i phyir du zhes dris pa dang / des bdag gi bu thon bu byung bas bu'i bya ba dag ma 'tshal te khyod kyis mkhyen nam zhes dris pa dang / sbom dga' mos smras pa khyod ni khab khrin dang 'dra ste las gcig pu byed shes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: “You are like a needle and thread. You only know how to do one thing.🔽I know all the arts and crafts. Give me alms.🔽Have you given alms to my preceptor and to my fellow brahmacārin and to my friends?

original: ngas ni las kyi gnas @137b dang bzo'i gnas thams cad shes kyi nga la bsod snyoms byin cig / nga'i mkhan mo byin nam tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang mdza' mo'i bsod snyoms kyang byin cig / khyod kyi bu'i bya ba ngas bya'o zhes smras nas khyim
analyzed: ngas ni las kyi gnas @137b dang bzo'i gnas thams cad shes kyi nga la bsod snyoms byin cig / nga'i mkhan mo byin nam tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang mdza' mo'i bsod snyoms kyang byin cig / khyod kyi bu'i bya ba ngas bya'o zhes smras nas khyim
translated: I will perform the rites for your son.”

original: bdag mo des kyang bsod snyoms mang du byin no //
analyzed: bdag mo des kyang bsod snyoms mang du byin no //
translated: The householder gave her many alms.

original: de nas sbom dga' mos bu de legs par bkrus legs par phyis nas /
analyzed: de nas sbom dga' mos bu de legs par bkrus legs par phyis nas /
translated: Then Thullanandā bathed the child well and wiped him well.

original: mtshog ma sra bar bya ba'i phyir sa lci ba'i 'ji bas bskus /
analyzed: mtshog ma sra bar bya ba'i phyir sa lci ba'i 'ji bas bskus /
translated: To make his head firm, she smeared it with heavy clay.

original: gnod pa bsrung ba'i phyir sgo ka'i sa las dpal bar thig le gsum byas nas bsod snyoms mang du khyer te song ngo //
analyzed: gnod pa bsrung ba'i phyir sgo ka'i sa las dpal bar thig le gsum byas nas bsod snyoms mang du khyer te song ngo //
translated: In order to protect her from harm, she made three auspicious dots of white mustard seed paste on her forehead and took a lot of alms.

original: de'i 'og tu de'i khyim thab kyang 'ongs nas bu'i bya ba byas pa mthong nas chung ma la smras pa /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de'i khyim thab kyang 'ongs nas bu'i bya ba byas pa mthong nas chung ma la smras pa /
translated: Later, her husband came home and saw that the duties of a son had been done. He said to his wife,🔽“Bhadrikā, it is good that the duties of a son have been well done.”🔽She said, “I did not do it. Thīlī had it done.”

original: bzang mo bu'i bya ba bdag legs par byas pa ni legs so legs so zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa bdag gis ni ma 'tshal gyi sbom dga' mos bgyis so zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa phyis kyang dge slong ma dag 'ongs pa dang byed du chug shig ces smras so //
analyzed: bzang mo bu'i bya ba bdag legs par byas pa ni legs so legs so zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa bdag gis ni ma 'tshal gyi sbom dga' mos bgyis so zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa phyis kyang dge slong ma dag 'ongs pa dang byed du chug shig ces smras so //
translated: He said, “Later, when the bhikṣuṇīs come, have it done.”

original: dus gzhan zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las khyim de'i sgor phyin no //
analyzed: dus gzhan zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las khyim de'i sgor phyin no //
translated: Later, Mahāprajāpatī entered for alms and came to the door of that house.

original: khyim bdag mo des smras pa /
analyzed: khyim bdag mo des smras pa /
translated: The wife of the householder said,🔽“Noble one, please come in.”

original: 'phags ma bu'i bya ba byos shig ces smras pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag mos smras pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' lhums nas byung ba ma gtogs par gzhan gyi bu'i bya ba byed ngas ma myong ba'i steng du /🔽dge slong mas khyod kyi bu'i bya ba byas na ni khyod la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du 'phel lo zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag mo des sngon sbom dga' mos bu'i bya ba byed pa dag zhib tu smras pa dang / khyim bdag mo des thos nas dge slong ma rnams 'phya zhing mi snyan pa zer ba las bcas /
analyzed: 'phags ma bu'i bya ba byos shig ces smras pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag mos smras pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' lhums nas byung ba ma gtogs par gzhan gyi bu'i bya ba byed ngas ma myong ba'i steng du / dge slong mas khyod kyi bu'i bya ba byas na ni khyod la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du 'phel lo zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag mo des sngon sbom dga' mos bu'i bya ba byed pa dag zhib tu smras pa dang / khyim bdag mo des thos nas dge slong ma rnams 'phya zhing mi snyan pa zer ba las bcas /
translated: The lady of the people said, Except for the Bodhisattva when he was born from the womb, I have never done the duties of a mother for anyone else.🔽If a nun does the duties of a mother for you, then much demerit will accrue to you. She told in detail how before, Thullananda had done the duties of a mother.🔽When the lady of the house heard this, she ridiculed and reviled the nuns.

original: yang dge slong ma gang rgyud 'jog na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang rgyud 'jog na ltung ba'o //
translated: If a nun inserts her organ into the organ of a boy, she commits an offense.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: If a nun means Thullananda.

original: rgyud ces bya ba ni bus pa chung ngu la bya ste rigs kyi rgyud la bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba ni bus pa chung ngu la bya ste rigs kyi rgyud la bya'o //
translated: The word organ refers to a small child, and it refers to the organ of a family.

original: 'jog ces bya ba ni 'khru ba dang 'phyi ba dang / gos bskon pa dang / zas bsnyod cing rtsed mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jog ces bya ba ni 'khru ba dang 'phyi ba dang / gos bskon pa dang / zas bsnyod cing rtsed mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: “To take care of” means to bathe, to massage, to dress, to feed, to play with, and so on.

original: dge slong mas gzhan gyi bu chung ngu 'khru bar byed dam 'phyi bar byed dam gos bskon nam zas bsnyod na thams cad du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas gzhan gyi bu chung ngu 'khru bar byed dam 'phyi bar byed dam gos bskon nam zas bsnyod na thams cad du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a nun bathes, massages, dresses, or feeds the child of another, she commits an offense in each case.

original: gnyen du 'ongs pa la nyes med do //
analyzed: gnyen du 'ongs pa la nyes med do //
translated: If the other person is a relative, there is no offense.

original: ltung ba brgya bzhi bcu @138a * //🔽pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya bzhi bcu @138a * // pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and forty-fourth downfall.🔽This concludes the chapter on the one hundred and forty downfalls that require confession but are not grave offenses, the first chapter of the “Foundations” section of this text.

original: // / mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: // / mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: The summary:

original: khrus ras bcang bar bya ba dang // chos gos bkru bar bya ba dang // sbyar ma dang ni brje ba dang // dge sbyong chos gos sbyin pa dang // sme gab dang ni tshogs kyi gos //
analyzed: khrus ras bcang bar bya ba dang // chos gos bkru bar bya ba dang // sbyar ma dang ni brje ba dang // dge sbyong chos gos sbyin pa dang // sme gab dang ni tshogs kyi gos //
translated: Keeping a bathing cloth, washing robes, Sewing, exchanging, giving robes to monastics, Robes for the sick, robes for the Saṅgha,

original: dbul po yi rang byed pa dang // gtan pa dbyung bar bya ba dang // chos gos bgo bsha' bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbul po yi rang byed pa dang // gtan pa dbyung bar bya ba dang // chos gos bgo bsha' bya ba'o //
translated: The poor, rejoicing, making a rule, And distributing robes.

original: ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mo chu bo aa tsir ba ra ta'i nang na khyim mi mo dag dang lhan cig khrus byed pa'i tshe de dag la rmongs bstan nas nga'i spu phyogs gcig tu 'khyil zhing lcang lo can du 'dug pa ltos zhes de dag la ngom pa dang /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo chu bo aa tsir ba ra ta'i nang na khyim mi mo dag dang lhan cig khrus byed pa'i tshe de dag la rmongs bstan nas nga'i spu phyogs gcig tu 'khyil zhing lcang lo can du 'dug pa ltos zhes de dag la ngom pa dang /
translated: When Thulsi was bathing in the river Aciravatî with some laywomen, she showed them her private parts, saying, “Look at my hair, which curls to the right like that of the women of Changlo-chen.”

original: dge slong ma gzhan dag 'phya bar gyur pa las bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong ma gzhan dag 'phya bar gyur pa las bka' stsal pa /
translated: The other nuns criticized her, and the Blessed One said,

original: phyin chad khrus byed na khrus ras gyon la khrus gyis shig ces bcas /
analyzed: phyin chad khrus byed na khrus ras gyon la khrus gyis shig ces bcas /
translated: “From now on, when you bathe, you must wear a bathing skirt.”

original: yang dge slong ma gang khrus ras mi 'chang na ltung ba'o /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang khrus ras mi 'chang na ltung ba'o /
translated: If a nun does not wear a bathing skirt, she commits an offense.

original: dge slong mas khrus ras med par khrus byed na 'bab chu 'am lteng ka'i nang na 'ang rung ste /
analyzed: dge slong mas khrus ras med par khrus byed na 'bab chu 'am lteng ka'i nang na 'ang rung ste /
translated: If a nun bathes without a bathing skirt, whether in a river or a pool,

original: dang por chur zhugs nas lte bar ma phyin gyi bar du ni nyes byas /🔽lte ba 'das na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dang por chur zhugs nas lte bar ma phyin gyi bar du ni nyes byas /🔽lte ba 'das na ltung ba'o //
translated: she commits an offense of wrong conduct until she is waist deep in the water.🔽If she is more than waist deep in the water, she commits an offense entailing confession.

original: chu bcus pa zhig la khrus byed na 'ang dang po mgo nas yas blugs nas lte bar ma phyin gyi bar du nyes byas /
analyzed: chu bcus pa zhig la khrus byed na 'ang dang po mgo nas yas blugs nas lte bar ma phyin gyi bar du nyes byas /
translated: If one bathes with water that has been drawn, it is a misdeed until the water reaches the navel, if one pours it from the top of the head.

original: lte ba las blangs 'das na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lte ba las blangs 'das na ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one pours it from below the navel, it becomes a downfall.

original: gcig pur khang pa dben pa na khrus byed na khrus ras med na 'ang nyes med do //
analyzed: gcig pur khang pa dben pa na khrus byed na khrus ras med na 'ang nyes med do //
translated: If one bathes alone in a private house, there is no fault even if one does not have a bathing cloth.

original: ltung ba brgya bzhi bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltung ba brgya bzhi bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
translated: The one hundred and forty-first downfall.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste /🔽sbom dga' mo sham thabs khrag gis phog pa khyer nas khrus mkhan gyi nang du song ste /
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na ste / sbom dga' mo sham thabs khrag gis phog pa khyer nas khrus mkhan gyi nang du song ste /
translated: The Teacher was in Śrāvastī.🔽Pramudita took a lower robe that was stained with blood to a laundryman and said, “Good man, please wash this for me.”

original: bzhin bzangs nga'i 'di khrus te byin cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa gos phal 'khru ba'i nang du chug shig ces bsgo ba dang sbom dga' mos kyang der bcug go //
analyzed: bzhin bzangs nga'i 'di khrus te byin cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa gos phal 'khru ba'i nang du chug shig ces bsgo ba dang sbom dga' mos kyang der bcug go //
translated: He said, “Put it in the wash with the other clothes.” Pramudita did so.

original: de'i 'og tu khrus mkhan des gos bkru bar bshams pa dang / sbom dga' mo'i sham thabs de khrag gis phog pa mthong nas 'dis nga'i gos thams cad mi gtsang bas 'phags te ma rung bar gyur to zhes de yang khros par gyur pa las bcas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu khrus mkhan des gos bkru bar bshams pa dang / sbom dga' mo'i sham thabs de khrag gis phog pa mthong nas 'dis nga'i gos thams cad mi gtsang bas 'phags te ma rung bar gyur to zhes de yang khros par gyur pa las bcas /
translated: Later, the washerman prepared to wash the robes, and when he saw that Thullanandā’s lower robe was stained with blood, he became angry, thinking, “This nun has ruined all my clothes with her filth.”

analyzed: sbom dga' mos rgyal rigs dag la glu bslabs pa las /

analyzed: bram ze dag ma dad de 'phya ba las bcas / yang @144a * //

analyzed: dar ma klog pa'i tshe gtang rag snyen par zer ba nyes med /

analyzed: au shi ra zhes bya ba ni gres ma'i rtsa ba las byas pa'i //

analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang so mangs 'chang na ltung ba'o //

translated: They ran off with the coins, but the men pursued them and caught them. They pulled out their hair and their wigs fell off. The men said, “These are wicked women with shaved heads!” The nuns heard this and they criticized them.

analyzed: skrod pa dang ni yang yang dang // bzang po gnas dang sman byed gnas gnyis dang // gdeng med lo ma stang dang ras chen dang // dgu bcu po las bco brgyad 'di bkol te //

analyzed: hu hu mi bya bar bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis spyan drangs pa las khyim bdag de dbul po zhig ste /

analyzed: des dgun gyi dus su kha zas grang mo brims pa dang / de dag gis bsting ba'i phyir phu phu zhes bya ste za'o //
translated: In the winter, he served cold food. In order to warm it, they made ‘phu phu’ sounds and ate.

original: de nas khyim bdag de mgo smad nas 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas khyim bdag de mgo smad nas 'di skad ces smras so //

analyzed: 'phags ma dag bdag @152a * // gis 'tshal mod kyi /

original: bdag dbul bas ji ltar bgyi zhes pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bdag dbul bas ji ltar bgyi zhes pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: phu bu mi bya bar zas bza' bar bya bar bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: “You should train in eating food without making a show of it.”

original: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag gzhan zhig gis spyan drangs pa dang / des de dag la kha zas ngan pa zhig byin pa dang / de dag de la kha zas kyi bsngags pa brjod do //
analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag gzhan zhig gis spyan drangs pa dang / des de dag la kha zas ngan pa zhig byin pa dang / de dag de la kha zas kyi bsngags pa brjod do //
translated: Then the group of twelve nuns were invited by someone else, and that person gave them bad food, and they praised it to her.

original: gzhan zhig gis de dag la kha zas bzang po zhig byin pa dang / de la 'phyas 'dogs par byed pa nas /
analyzed: gzhan zhig gis de dag la kha zas bzang po zhig byin pa dang / de la 'phyas 'dogs par byed pa nas /
translated: When someone else gave them good food, they disparaged it.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: bsngags pa dang 'phyas mi gdags par zas bza' bar bslab pa'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bsngags pa dang 'phyas mi gdags par zas bza' bar bslab pa'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: “You should train in eating food without praising or disparaging it.”

original: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag mandala gyi steng du kha zas gtor te 'brum bu re re nas btus te khar bcug pa dang / dge slong ma dag gis ci'i phyir 'di ltar byed ces dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa khyim bya dag 'di ltar gtor ba la thu'o zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag mandala gyi steng du kha zas gtor te 'brum bu re re nas btus te khar bcug pa dang / dge slong ma dag gis ci'i phyir 'di ltar byed ces dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa khyim bya dag 'di ltar gtor ba la thu'o zhes pa nas /
translated: They said, “We scatter it like this for the chickens.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'bru nas tha dad du mi bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'bru nas tha dad du mi bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: “Do not separate the grains.”

original: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag kham phyed tsam bldad de lce'i rtse mor bzhag nas gcig la gcig ston te yang bldad dam zhes nas /
analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag kham phyed tsam bldad de lce'i rtse mor bzhag nas gcig la gcig ston te yang bldad dam zhes nas /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: lce phyung ste zas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: lce phyung ste zas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: “Do not chew with your tongue sticking out.”

original: bcu gnyis sde mo dag rkan gtog cing zan za bas /
analyzed: bcu gnyis sde mo dag rkan gtog cing zan za bas /
translated: The group of six nuns ate food while smacking their lips.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Do not eat food while smacking your lips.”

original: rkan gtogs te zan mi bza' bar bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rkan gtogs te zan mi bza' bar bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: One should train in not eating with one’s cheeks puffed out.”

original: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag zan kham gyis gcod cing za ste /
analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag zan kham gyis gcod cing za ste /

original: de dag kham gcig ni khar bcug / gnyis pa ni lag pa na /
analyzed: de dag kham gcig ni khar bcug / gnyis pa ni lag pa na /
translated: One bite was in their mouths, a second was in their hands,

original: gsum pa ni lhung bzed na 'dug pa nas /
analyzed: gsum pa ni lhung bzed na 'dug pa nas /
translated: and a third was in their alms bowls.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / kham 'phror mi gcad par bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / kham 'phror mi gcad par bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, “One should train in not cutting off bites.”

original: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag zas za ba'i tshe mkhur ba nas mkhur bar spyod pa nas /
analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag zas za ba'i tshe mkhur ba nas mkhur bar spyod pa nas /

original: nad pa di dag 'di ltar za'o zhes pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: nad pa di dag 'di ltar za'o zhes pa'i bar du ste /
translated: “The sick eat like this.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: mkhur bar mi spo bar zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: “One should train in not moving food from cheek to cheek.”

analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las chu 'gram zhig @152b gi drung du phyin te /
translated: Then the group of twelve went wandering through the countryside and came to a riverbank.

analyzed: de dag gis gnas der chos gos dag sprugs rkang lag bkrus te zas kyi bya ba byed pa la zhugs so //
translated: They shook out their robes, washed their feet, and sat down to eat.

original: de nas chu 'gram gyi pha rol du gcer bu ma dag gcig kyang phyin te /
analyzed: de nas chu 'gram gyi pha rol du gcer bu ma dag gcig kyang phyin te /
translated: Then some naked ascetics came to the bank of the river.

original: zas kyi bya ba byed pa la zhugs pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: zas kyi bya ba byed pa la zhugs pa'i bar du ste /
translated: They shook out their robes, washed their feet, and sat down to eat.

original: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag rtse bar bya ba'i bsam pas 'os srungs rdzogs byed kyi ming nas phyung ste /
analyzed: de nas bcu gnyis sde mo dag rtse bar bya ba'i bsam pas 'os srungs rdzogs byed kyi ming nas phyung ste /
translated: Then the nuns of the group of six, with the intention of playing a trick, called out the name of Pūraṇa Kāśyapa.

analyzed: zan gyi mchod rten byas nas la phug gi srog shing btsugs te gcer bu ma de dag la khyed kyi ston pa'i mchod rten 'di yin no zhes smras so //

original: de nas mchod rten de la bcad cing za ste /
analyzed: de nas mchod rten de la bcad cing za ste /

analyzed: tshig gcig tu 'di skad ces rdzogs byed kyi mchod rten gzhig go //

original: de nas gcer bu ma de dag yid mi dga' ba skyes te /
analyzed: de nas gcer bu ma de dag yid mi dga' ba skyes te /
